## SessionTemporaryStorageService class

Implementation of temporary storage using SessionStorage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SessionTemporaryStorageService implements TemporaryStorage 
```
<b>Implements:</b> TemporaryStorage

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(name)](./common-store.sessiontemporarystorageservice.get.md) |  | Gets value that was stored with 'name' from temporary storage |
|  [remove(name)](./common-store.sessiontemporarystorageservice.remove.md) |  | Removes value stored with 'name' from temporary storage |
|  [set(name, value)](./common-store.sessiontemporarystorageservice.set.md) |  | Sets value that will be stored with 'name'e in temporary storage |
